[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@keymanapp/kmc-generate](./kmc-generate.md) &gt; [LexicalModelGenerator](./kmc-generate.lexicalmodelgenerator.md)

## LexicalModelGenerator class

Generate a Keyman lexical model project. The generator does not read or write from filesystem or network directly, but relies on callbacks for all external IO.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class LexicalModelGenerator extends BasicGenerator implements KeymanCompiler 
```
**Extends:** BasicGenerator

**Implements:** KeymanCompiler

## Methods

<table><thead><tr><th>

Method


</th><th>

Modifiers


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[run()](./kmc-generate.lexicalmodelgenerator.run.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Generate a Lexical Model project. Returns an object containing binary artifacts on success. The files are passed in by name, and the compiler will use callbacks as passed to the [AbstractGenerator.init()](./kmc-generate.abstractgenerator.init.md) function to read any input files by disk.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
